Description: Min. width for channel length of LPMOS(1.5V) must be  >=  0.13 um
Min. width for channel length of HPMOS(3.3V) must be  >=  0.3 um
Min. width for channel length of HPMOS(5V) must be  >=  0.8 um
Min. width for channel length of Quasi_HV PMOS must be  >=  1.0 um
Min. width for channel length of LNMOS(1.5V) must be  >=  0.13 um
Min. width for channel length of HNMOS(3.3V) must be  >=  0.35 um
Min. width for channel length of HNMOS(5V) must be  >=  0.8 um
Min. width for channel length of Quasi_HV HNMOS must be  >=  1.0 um
Min. width for interconnect must be  >=  0.13 um
Min. width for interconnect for 5V/Quasi_HV MOS must be  >=  0.2 um
Min. spacing between two GT regions must be  >=  0.145 um
Min. GT space  >=  0.315 um when GT area is more than 4 , 000 , 000um2
Min. spacing between two GT regions in the same TO must be  >=  0.16 um
Min. spacing between two GT regions in the 3.3V region must be  >=  0.225 um
Min. spacing between two GT regions in the 5V/Quasi_HV region must be  >=  0.4 um
Min. clearance from TO region to a GT on field oxide must be  >=  0.06 um
Min. clearance from TO region to a GT on field oxide for 5V/Quasi_HV MOS must be  >=  0.2 um
Min. endcap with GT over TO must be  >=  0.16 um
Min. endcap with GT over TO for 5V/Quasi_HV NMOS and 5V/Quasi_HV PMOS must be  >=  0.3 um
Min. endcap with GT over TO for 5V/Quasi_HV ZMOS must be  >=  0.4 um
Min. width of 45 degree bend poly on field oxied must be  >=  0.14 um    if the bend poly length is  >= 0.39um
Min. extension of TO region beyond a related GT inside TO must be  >=  0.205 um
Min. extension of TO region beyond a related GT inside TO for 5V/Quasi_HV MOS must be  >=  0.44 um
Min. GT area must be  >=  0.073 um2
Min. GT enclosure area must be  >=  0.122 um2.
Min TO width must be  >=  0.135 um
Min TO width for 5V/Quasi_HV NMOS and 5V/Quasi_HV PMOS Channel Width must be  >=  0.8 um
Min TO width for 5V/Quasi_HV ZMOS Channel Width must be  >=  1.2 um
Min TO width for 1.5V ZMOS and 3.3V ZMOS Channel Width must be  >=  1.0 um
Min TO width for interconnect for 5V/Quasi_HV MOS must be  >=  0.22 um
Min TO except SRAM cell and 5V/Quasi_HV MOS area space must be  >=  0.185 um
Min TO in SRAM cell space must be  >=  0.18 um
Min TO space when 5V/Quasi_HV MOS is involved ,  except pickup must be  >=  0.8 um
Min TO space when 5V/Quasi_HV MOS TO to pickup TO must be  >=  0.5 um
TO cross VTSRAM layer is not allowed.
Min extension of TB beyond N+TO region which is inside the TB must be  >=  0.215 um
Min clearance from TB edge to N+TO region which is outside cold/hot TB must be  >=  0.275 um
Min extension of TB beyond P+TO region which is inside TB must be  >=  0.275 um
Min clearance from TB edge to P+TO region which is outside TB must be  >=  0.215 um
Min clearance from poly edge to the edge of a butted diffusion TO region   that has no common run length parallel to transistor channel must be  >=  0.285 um
Min clearance from poly edge to the edge of a butted diffusion TO region   that is parallel to transistor channel must be  >=  0.36 um
Min clearance from poly edge to the edge of a butted diffusion TO region   that is parallel to transistor channel must be  >=  0.36 um
One segment of the consecutive SN/SP edge of a butted   diffusion active should be longer than 0.27 um
Min implant area for the butted diffusion is 0.25 um2
When J < 0.3um , Max length of (TO(source) interact with butted diffusion) must be  <=  0.54 um
Min. clearance from TB edge to a N+TO region which is outside a TB connected to DN must be  >=  0.385 um
Min. TO area must be  >=  0.1 um2.
Min. TO enclosure area must be  >=  0.122 um2.
TO must be fully covered BY N+/P+ except dummy active , Logo and NW resistor within TO
Recommended Min. TO width for stable Idsat(avoid corner rounding effect) must be  >=  0.3 um
Recommended Min .TO space is 0.26 um to reduce short possibility caseed by particle
Min. & Max. Contact size must be == 0.14 um
Min. & Max. Contact width of W1 bar must be == ^W1_a2, W1 bar is only allowed in seal ring
Min W1 space must be >= 0.165 um
Min W1 space in W1 array must be >= 0.18 um. (W1 number >= 4.0 x 4.0 (row and column >= w1_b1_num) with space <= 0.21 um)
Min clearance from W1 on TO region to a GT of 1.5V devices must be >= 0.095 um
Min clearance from W1 on TO region to a GT of 3.3V devices must be >= 0.115 um
Min clearance from W1 on TO region to a GT of 5V/Quasi_HV devices must be >= 0.13 um
Min clearance from W1 on GT to TO must be >= 0.125 um
Min extension of TO beyond TO W1 must be >= 0.06 um
Min extension of GT beyond a poly W1 must be >= 0.06 um
Min extension of butted SP region beyond an TO W1 region must be >= 0.08 um
Min extension of butted SP region beyond an TO W1 region must be >= 0.08 um
W1.g.1: Min extension of butted SN region beyond an TO W1 region must be >= 0.08 um
W1.g.2: Min extension of butted SN region beyond an TO W1 region must be >= 0.08 um
W1 on Gate poly over TO is not allowed.
W1 without the cover of (GATE or TO) is not allowed
W1 on the body of any resistor is not allowed.
Recommended Min extension of TO beyond TO W1 to avoid high Rc is 0.12 um
Recommended Min extension of GT beyond a Poly W1 to avoid high Rc is W1_f_guid um.
Min width of A1 region must be  >=  0.14 um
Min width of 45 degree bent metal must be  >=  0.18 um if the bent metal length is  >=  0.45 um
Min space of A1 region must be  >=  0.165 um
Min extension of A1 beyond W1 region must be  >=  0.0 um
Min extension of A1 end-of-line beyond W1 region must be  >=  0.045 um

Min space between metal lines must be  >=  0.45 um with one or both metal line width and length  >= 10um;   Min space between metal line and a small piece of metal( < 10um) must be  >=  0.45 um   that is connected to the wide metal within 1.0 range from the wide metal
Min space between two metal line must be  >=  0.2 um with at least one metal line width is >= 0.27um and the parallel run length is  >= 1.0um
Min space between 45 degree bent metal must be  >=  0.195 um (the bent metal length is  >= 0.45um)
Min area A1 must be  >=  0.1 um2.
Min enclosed area must be  >=  0.162 um2.
Recommended Min extension of A1 end-of-line beyond W1 region is 0.08 um to avoid high Rc
Recommended Min extension of A1 (width  > 0.6um) beyond W1 region is 0.08 um to avoid high Rc
Recommended Min space between non-A1 regions is 0.35 um(one of non-A1 regions > 4 , 000 , 000um2).   non-A1 region is (not(A1 or A1 dummy))
